short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you plant trees for free while you shop online!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our chrome extension will let you plant trees while you shop online! When you visit one of our many partnered websites, you'll be able to activate afiliatree so that when you order from that store, we'll be able to plant trees on your behalf. We've made the process as convenient as possible for you! 

How is this free?
The reason we are able to do this for free is because whenever you purchase from our partners, they will pay us a small commission which we use to plant the trees. We are part of the Awin Affiliate Program which lets us work with lots of different brands to help the environment.

Where are the trees planted?
We have partnered with WeForest who plant trees where they're needed the most. Places include Malawi, Ethiopia, India, Tanzania, Brazil and more.

How is shopping online eco-friendly?
We understand that a lot of brands still have a long way to becoming more eco-friendly, and that consumerism in general isn't great for the environment. However, we are also realistic and know that people won't stop shopping online any time soon, so our afiliatree chrome extension is a way to make shopping online that little bit more eco-friendly. 

We welcome you to install our extension and join our movement!
